CreateBotVersion.name: CreateBotVersion
CreateBotVersion.description: Creates a new version based on the $LATEST version of the specified bot.

CreateIntentVersion.name: CreateIntentVersion
CreateIntentVersion.description: Creates a new version based on the $LATEST version of the specified intent.

CreateSlotTypeVersion.name: CreateSlotTypeVersion
CreateSlotTypeVersion.description: Creates a new version based on the $LATEST version of the specified slot type.

DeleteBot.name: DeleteBot
DeleteBot.description: Deletes all versions of a bot.

DeleteBotAlias.name: DeleteBotAlias
DeleteBotAlias.description: Deletes an alias for a specific bot.

DeleteBotChannelAssociation.name: DeleteBotChannelAssociation
DeleteBotChannelAssociation.description: Deletes the association between a Amazon Lex bot alias and a messaging platform.

DeleteBotVersion.name: DeleteBotVersion
DeleteBotVersion.description: Deletes a specific version of a bot.

DeleteIntent.name: DeleteIntent
DeleteIntent.description: Deletes all versions of an intent.

DeleteIntentVersion.name: DeleteIntentVersion
DeleteIntentVersion.description: Deletes a specific version of an intent.

DeleteSession.name: DeleteSession
DeleteSession.description: Removes session information for a specified bot, alias, and user ID.

DeleteSlotType.name: DeleteSlotType
DeleteSlotType.description: Deletes all versions of a slot type.

DeleteSlotTypeVersion.name: DeleteSlotTypeVersion
DeleteSlotTypeVersion.description: Deletes a specific version of a slot type.

DeleteUtterances.name: DeleteUtterances
DeleteUtterances.description:
Deletes the information Amazon Lex maintains for utterances on a specific bot and
                                                userId.

GetBot.name: GetBot
GetBot.description:
Returns information for a specific bot. In addition to the bot name, the bot version
                                                or alias is required.

GetBotAlias.name: GetBotAlias
GetBotAlias.description: Returns information about a Amazon Lex bot alias.

GetBotAliases.name: GetBotAliases
GetBotAliases.description: Returns a list of aliases for a given Amazon Lex bot.

GetBotChannelAssociation.name: GetBotChannelAssociation
GetBotChannelAssociation.description:
Returns information about the association between a Amazon Lex bot and a messaging
                                                platform.

GetBotChannelAssociations.name: GetBotChannelAssociations
GetBotChannelAssociations.description: Returns a list of all of the channels associated with a single bot.

GetBotVersions.name: GetBotVersions
GetBotVersions.description: Returns information for all versions of a specific bot.

GetBots.name: GetBots
GetBots.description:
Returns information for the $LATEST version of all bots, subject to filters provided
                                                by the client.

GetBuiltinIntent.name: GetBuiltinIntent
GetBuiltinIntent.description: Returns information about a built-in intent.

GetBuiltinIntents.name: GetBuiltinIntents
GetBuiltinIntents.description: Gets a list of built-in intents that meet the specified criteria.

GetBuiltinSlotTypes.name: GetBuiltinSlotTypes
GetBuiltinSlotTypes.description: Gets a list of built-in slot types that meet the specified criteria.

GetExport.name: GetExport
GetExport.description: Exports Amazon Lex Resource in a requested format.

GetImport.name: GetImport
GetImport.description: Gets information about an import job started with StartImport.

GetIntent.name: GetIntent
GetIntent.description:
Returns information for a specific intent. In addition to the intent name, you must
                                                also specify the intent version.

GetIntentVersions.name: GetIntentVersions
GetIntentVersions.description: Returns information for all versions of a specific intent.

GetIntents.name: GetIntents
GetIntents.description:
Returns information for the $LATEST version of all intents, subject to filters provided
                                                by the client.

GetSession.name: GetSession
GetSession.description: Returns session information for a specified bot, alias, and user ID.

GetSlotType.name: GetSlotType
GetSlotType.description:
Returns information about a specific version of a slot type. In addition to specifying
                                                the slot type name, you must also specify the slot type version.

GetSlotTypeVersions.name: GetSlotTypeVersions
GetSlotTypeVersions.description: Returns information for all versions of a specific slot type.

GetSlotTypes.name: GetSlotTypes
GetSlotTypes.description:
Returns information for the $LATEST version of all slot types, subject to filters
                                                provided by the client.

GetUtterancesView.name: GetUtterancesView
GetUtterancesView.description:
Returns a view of aggregate utterance data for versions of a bot for a recent time
                                                period.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Lists tags for a Lex resource

PostContent.name: PostContent
PostContent.description: Sends user input (text or speech) to Amazon Lex.

PostText.name: PostText
PostText.description: Sends user input (text-only) to Amazon Lex.

PutBot.name: PutBot
PutBot.description: Creates or updates the $LATEST version of a Amazon Lex conversational bot.

PutBotAlias.name: PutBotAlias
PutBotAlias.description: Creates or updates an alias for the specific bot.

PutIntent.name: PutIntent
PutIntent.description: Creates or updates the $LATEST version of an intent.

PutSession.name: PutSession
PutSession.description: Creates a new session or modifies an existing session with an Amazon Lex bot.

PutSlotType.name: PutSlotType
PutSlotType.description: Creates or updates the $LATEST version of a slot type.

StartImport.name: StartImport
StartImport.description: Starts a job to import a resource to Amazon Lex.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Adds or overwrites tags to a Lex resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Removes tags from a Lex resource
